00041 #ifndef __LNET_ST_H__
00042 #define __LNET_ST_H__
00043 
00044 #define LST_FEAT_NONE           (0)
00045 #define LST_FEAT_BULK_LEN       (1 << 0)        /* enable variable page size */
00046 
00047 #define LST_FEATS_EMPTY         (LST_FEAT_NONE)
00048 #define LST_FEATS_MASK          (LST_FEAT_NONE | LST_FEAT_BULK_LEN)
00049 
00050 #define LST_NAME_SIZE           32              /* max name buffer length */
00051 
00052 #define LSTIO_DEBUG             0xC00           /* debug */
00053 #define LSTIO_SESSION_NEW       0xC01           /* create session */
00054 #define LSTIO_SESSION_END       0xC02           /* end session */
00055 #define LSTIO_SESSION_INFO      0xC03           /* query session */
00056 #define LSTIO_GROUP_ADD         0xC10           /* add group */
00057 #define LSTIO_GROUP_LIST        0xC11           /* list all groups in session */
00058 #define LSTIO_GROUP_INFO        0xC12           /* query defailt infomation of specified group */
00059 #define LSTIO_GROUP_DEL         0xC13           /* delete group */
00060 #define LSTIO_NODES_ADD         0xC14           /* add nodes to specified group */
00061 #define LSTIO_GROUP_UPDATE      0xC15           /* update group */
00062 #define LSTIO_BATCH_ADD         0xC20           /* add batch */
00063 #define LSTIO_BATCH_START       0xC21           /* start batch */
00064 #define LSTIO_BATCH_STOP        0xC22           /* stop batch */
00065 #define LSTIO_BATCH_DEL         0xC23           /* delete batch */
00066 #define LSTIO_BATCH_LIST        0xC24           /* show all batches in the session */
00067 #define LSTIO_BATCH_INFO        0xC25           /* show defail of specified batch */
00068 #define LSTIO_TEST_ADD          0xC26           /* add test (to batch) */
00069 #define LSTIO_BATCH_QUERY       0xC27           /* query batch status */
00070 #define LSTIO_STAT_QUERY        0xC30           /* get stats */
00071 
00072 typedef struct {
00073         lnet_nid_t              ses_nid;                /* nid of console node */
00074         __u64                   ses_stamp;              /* time stamp */
00075 } lst_sid_t;                                            /*** session id */
00076 
00077 extern lst_sid_t LST_INVALID_SID;
00078 
00079 typedef struct {
00080         __u64                   bat_id;                 /* unique id in session */
00081 } lst_bid_t;                                            /*** batch id (group of tests) */
00082 
00083 /* Status of test node */
00084 #define LST_NODE_ACTIVE         0x1                     /* node in this session */
00085 #define LST_NODE_BUSY           0x2                     /* node is taken by other session */
00086 #define LST_NODE_DOWN           0x4                     /* node is down */
00087 #define LST_NODE_UNKNOWN        0x8                     /* node not in session */
00088 
00089 typedef struct {
00090         lnet_process_id_t       nde_id;                 /* id of node */
00091         int                     nde_state;              /* state of node */
00092 } lstcon_node_ent_t;                                    /*** node entry, for list_group command */
00093 
00094 typedef struct {
00095         int                     nle_nnode;              /* # of nodes */
00096         int                     nle_nactive;            /* # of active nodes */
00097         int                     nle_nbusy;              /* # of busy nodes */
00098         int                     nle_ndown;              /* # of down nodes */
00099         int                     nle_nunknown;           /* # of unknown nodes */
00100 } lstcon_ndlist_ent_t;                                  /*** node_list entry, for list_batch command */
00101 
00102 typedef struct {
00103         int                     tse_type;               /* test type */
00104         int                     tse_loop;               /* loop count */
00105         int                     tse_concur;             /* concurrency of test */
00106 } lstcon_test_ent_t;                                    /*** test summary entry, for list_batch command */
00107 
00108 typedef struct {
00109         int                     bae_state;              /* batch status */
00110         int                     bae_timeout;            /* batch timeout */
00111         int                     bae_ntest;              /* # of tests in the batch */
00112 } lstcon_batch_ent_t;                                   /*** batch summary entry, for list_batch command */
00113 
00114 typedef struct {
00115         lstcon_ndlist_ent_t     tbe_cli_nle;            /* client (group) node_list entry */
00116         lstcon_ndlist_ent_t     tbe_srv_nle;            /* server (group) node_list entry */
00117         union {
00118                 lstcon_test_ent_t  tbe_test;            /* test entry */
00119                 lstcon_batch_ent_t tbe_batch;           /* batch entry */
00120         } u;
00121 } lstcon_test_batch_ent_t;                              /*** test/batch verbose information entry,
00122                                                          *** for list_batch command */
00123 
00124 typedef struct {
00125         struct list_head        rpe_link;               /* link chain */
00126         lnet_process_id_t       rpe_peer;               /* peer's id */
00127         struct timeval          rpe_stamp;              /* time stamp of RPC */
00128         int                     rpe_state;              /* peer's state */
00129         int                     rpe_rpc_errno;          /* RPC errno */
00130 
00131         lst_sid_t               rpe_sid;                /* peer's session id */
00132         int                     rpe_fwk_errno;          /* framework errno */
00133         int                     rpe_priv[4];            /* private data */
00134         char                    rpe_payload[0];         /* private reply payload */
00135 } lstcon_rpc_ent_t;
00136 
00137 typedef struct {
00138         int                     trs_rpc_stat[4];        /* RPCs stat (0: total, 1: failed, 2: finished, 4: reserved */
00139         int                     trs_rpc_errno;          /* RPC errno */
00140         int                     trs_fwk_stat[8];        /* framework stat */
00141         int                     trs_fwk_errno;          /* errno of the first remote error */
00142         void                   *trs_fwk_private;        /* private framework stat */
00143 } lstcon_trans_stat_t;
00144 
00145 static inline int
00146 lstcon_rpc_stat_total(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)
00147 {
00148         return inc ? ++stat->trs_rpc_stat[0] : stat->trs_rpc_stat[0];
00149 }
00150 
00151 static inline int
00152 lstcon_rpc_stat_success(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)
00153 {
00154         return inc ? ++stat->trs_rpc_stat[1] : stat->trs_rpc_stat[1];
00155 }
00156 
00157 static inline int
00158 lstcon_rpc_stat_failure(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)
00159 {
00160         return inc ? ++stat->trs_rpc_stat[2] : stat->trs_rpc_stat[2];
00161 }
00162 
00163 static inline int
00164 lstcon_sesop_stat_success(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)
00165 {
00166         return inc ? ++stat->trs_fwk_stat[0] : stat->trs_fwk_stat[0];
00167 }
00168 
00169 static inline int
00170 lstcon_sesop_stat_failure(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)
00171 {
00172         return inc ? ++stat->trs_fwk_stat[1] : stat->trs_fwk_stat[1];
00173 }
00174 
00175 static inline int
00176 lstcon_sesqry_stat_active(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)
00177 {
00178         return inc ? ++stat->trs_fwk_stat[0] : stat->trs_fwk_stat[0];
00179 }
00180 
00181 static inline int
00182 lstcon_sesqry_stat_busy(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)
00183 {
00184         return inc ? ++stat->trs_fwk_stat[1] : stat->trs_fwk_stat[1];
00185 }
00186 
00187 static inline int
00188 lstcon_sesqry_stat_unknown(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)
00189 {
00190         return inc ? ++stat->trs_fwk_stat[2] : stat->trs_fwk_stat[2];
00191 }
00192

00194 lstcon_tsbop_stat_success(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)

00196         return inc ? ++stat->trs_fwk_stat[0] : stat->trs_fwk_stat[0];
00197 }
00198

00202         return inc ? ++stat->trs_fwk_stat[1] : stat->trs_fwk_stat[1];
00203 }

00206 lstcon_tsbqry_stat_idle(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)
00207 {
00208         return inc ? ++stat->trs_fwk_stat[0] : stat->trs_fwk_stat[0];
00209 }

00212 lstcon_tsbqry_stat_run(lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat, int inc)

00235 /* create a session */
00236 typedef struct {
00237         int                     lstio_ses_key;          /* IN: local key */
00238         int                     lstio_ses_timeout;      /* IN: session timeout */
00239         int                     lstio_ses_force;        /* IN: force create ? */
00241         unsigned                lstio_ses_feats;
00242         lst_sid_t __user       *lstio_ses_idp;          /* OUT: session id */
00243         int                     lstio_ses_nmlen;        /* IN: name length */
00244         char __user            *lstio_ses_namep;        /* IN: session name */
00245 } lstio_session_new_args_t;
00246 
00247 /* query current session */
00248 typedef struct {
00249         lst_sid_t __user       *lstio_ses_idp;          /* OUT: session id */
00250         int __user             *lstio_ses_keyp;         /* OUT: local key */
00252         unsigned __user        *lstio_ses_featp;
00253         lstcon_ndlist_ent_t __user *lstio_ses_ndinfo;   /* OUT: */
00254         int                     lstio_ses_nmlen;        /* IN: name length */
00255         char __user            *lstio_ses_namep;        /* OUT: session name */
00256 } lstio_session_info_args_t;
00257 
00258 /* delete a session */
00259 typedef struct {
00260         int                     lstio_ses_key;          /* IN: session key */
00261 } lstio_session_end_args_t;

00264 #define LST_OPC_GROUP           2
00265 #define LST_OPC_NODES           3
00266 #define LST_OPC_BATCHCLI        4
00267 #define LST_OPC_BATCHSRV        5

00269 typedef struct {
00270         int                     lstio_dbg_key;          /* IN: session key */
00271         int                     lstio_dbg_type;         /* IN: debug sessin|batch|group|nodes list */
00272         int                     lstio_dbg_flags;        /* IN: reserved debug flags */
00273         int                     lstio_dbg_timeout;      /* IN: timeout of debug */
00274 
00275         int                     lstio_dbg_nmlen;        /* IN: len of name */
00276         char __user            *lstio_dbg_namep;        /* IN: name of group|batch */
00277         int                     lstio_dbg_count;        /* IN: # of test nodes to debug */
00278         lnet_process_id_t __user *lstio_dbg_idsp;       /* IN: id of test nodes */
00279         /* OUT: list head of result buffer */
00280         struct list_head __user *lstio_dbg_resultp;
00281 } lstio_debug_args_t;

00295 #define LST_GROUP_CLEAN         1                       /* remove inactive nodes in the group */
00296 #define LST_GROUP_REFRESH       2                       /* refresh inactive nodes in the group */
00297 #define LST_GROUP_RMND          3                       /* delete nodes from the group */

00299 typedef struct {
00300         int                     lstio_grp_key;          /* IN: session key */

00303         int                     lstio_grp_nmlen;        /* IN: name length */
00304         char __user            *lstio_grp_namep;        /* IN: group name */

00444 typedef struct {
00445         int                     lstio_tes_key;          /* IN: session key */
00446         int                     lstio_tes_bat_nmlen;    /* IN: batch name len */
00447         char __user            *lstio_tes_bat_name;     /* IN: batch name */
00448         int                     lstio_tes_type;         /* IN: test type */
00449         int                     lstio_tes_oneside;      /* IN: one sided test */
00450         int                     lstio_tes_loop;         /* IN: loop count */
00451         int                     lstio_tes_concur;       /* IN: concurrency */
00452 
00453         int                     lstio_tes_dist;         /* IN: node distribution in destination groups */
00454         int                     lstio_tes_span;         /* IN: node span in destination groups */
00455         int                     lstio_tes_sgrp_nmlen;   /* IN: source group name length */
00456         char __user            *lstio_tes_sgrp_name;    /* IN: group name */
00457         int                     lstio_tes_dgrp_nmlen;   /* IN: destination group name length */
00458         char __user            *lstio_tes_dgrp_name;    /* IN: group name */
00459 
00460         /* IN: param buffer len */
00461         int                      lstio_tes_param_len;
00462         /* IN: parameter for specified test:
00463                lstio_bulk_param_t,
00464                lstio_ping_param_t,
00465                ... more */
00466         void __user             *lstio_tes_param;
00467         /* OUT: private returned value */
00468         int __user              *lstio_tes_retp;
00469         /* OUT: list head of result buffer */
00470         struct list_head __user *lstio_tes_resultp;
00471 } lstio_test_args_t;
